Key Arguments: The bill will erode freedom of speech, which is a fundamental value of Australia.
Freedom of speech is essential for discovering truth and allowing free-flowing information.
The government should not be the arbiter of truth.
The bill will halt essential dialogue and debate.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is the bedrock of a free and fair society.
We do not want to live in a nation, where we are told what to think. It is unAustralian!
The proposed bill would do incredible damage and must be thrown out.
